data.meta_description:
York Street Station progress continues!

The construction of the brand new York Street Station continues at pace! The new high quality, state of the art‚Ä¶
data.text:
Where will today take me? Places that I know and love or places yet to see? Who will I meet, what will I learn? Let‚Äôs explore more and repeat on the return. Belfast Grand Central Station is something special, connecting us across the land. Imagine the possibilities, the opportunities, the scale and the journeys we can make, by bus, coach, and rail. Find out more: www.translink.co.uk/bgcs

Construction work on the new world class Belfast Grand Central Station is at a stage which will soon allow the public to have the opportunity to see inside Ireland‚Äôs largest state of the art integrated transport hub for trains, coaches and buses. Services will be introduced in phases with buses operating from the Europa Buscentre to move over first on Sunday 8th September. Extensive training is underway for staff in preparation for the move alongside a comprehensive testing, training and commissioning programme for the connecting rail line and new signalling technology. https://bit.ly/3Azn3g7

Where will today take me? Places that I know and love or places yet to see? Who will I meet, what will I learn? Let‚Äôs explore more and repeat on the return. Belfast Grand Central Station is something special, connecting us across the land. Imagine the possibilities, the opportunities, the scale and the journeys we can make, by bus, coach, and rail. Find out more: www.translink.co.uk/bgcs

It doesn‚Äôt matter whether you are walking, wheeling, cycling or using public transport, every mode is vital to keep our city centre running smoothly üèô Ensuring Belfast City Centre is operating efficiently and ensuring seamless travel is a major focus for our team during construction ü¶∫ We look forward to welcoming 20million of you to the island‚Äôs one of a kind Belfast Grand Central Station. A Grand Welcome awaits this Autumn‚Ä¶

We are passionate about ensuring that Belfast Grand Central Station reflects the rich heritage of our city. We‚Äôre working together with our local communities to bring this to life at the new station and in the surrounding areas üñåÔ∏è A Grand Welcome awaits this Autumn‚Ä¶

We were trying to come up with a piano pun‚Ä¶ but they all fell flat! Jokes aside, The GRAND Pianist Competition starts this week at Lanyon Place üéâ From Bach to Billy Joel, Elgar to Einaudi, Rachmaninoff to Richter‚Ä¶ we want to be entertained by all genres, and levels of ability üéπ ‚ÑπÔ∏è To register üëâ https://bit.ly/3MouiKF Coming to a station near you: Lanyon Place, Belfast; Newry Bus Station; Northwest Transport Hub, Derry~Londonderry; Bangor Train Station; and Coleraine Train Station.

If you‚Äôve ever watched popular talent show ‚ÄòThe Piano‚Äô and dreamed of dazzling a crowd with your command of the 88 black and white keys üéπ‚Ä¶now is your big chance. ‚ÄòThe GRAND Pianist‚Äô competition, open to all amateur players of any age and ability, will see regional heats happening across Northern Ireland, as part of a regional roadshow. A concert piano will travel to five rail and bus stations throughout August, ahead of the Grand Final at Belfast Grand Central Station this autumn. Kick-starting next week at Lanyon Place Train Station! The search is on for Northern Ireland‚Äôs new star pianist ‚≠êÔ∏è Find out more ‚û°Ô∏è https://bit.ly/46MHvGs

Great news for bus passengers across Northern Ireland! We have rolled out contactless payments on all Ulsterbus and Goldliner services, making your journey quicker and easier than ever. Whether you're hopping on a bus or train, you can now enjoy the convenience of contactless payments across the entire network. It‚Äôs all about making your travel experience smoother and more flexible. Want to know more? Head over to https://lnkd.in/eiS-6fvk for more details.
